attributes.action: give no more of OUR money to Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after the way they have treated one of our  nationals who was there to help them educate their children (something they couldn't manage by themselves) they are now calling for her execution over a teddy bear. I do not want any more of my money going to these people, and I don't think many other British people would either. It's our money, Mr Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
